column2: Composer, sculptor, painter, poet, prophet, sage, these are the makers of the after-world, the architects of heaven.
column3: Composer, sculptor, painter, poet, prophet, sage, these are the makers of the after world, the architects of heaven.

column2: The world is beautiful because they have lived; without them, labouring humanity would perish.

column2: Cherish your visions; cherish your ideals; cherish the music that stirs in your heart, the beauty that forms in your mind, the loveliness that drapes your purest thoughts, for out of them will grow all delightful conditions, all, heavenly environment; of these, if you but remain true to them, your world will at last be built.

column2: The greatest achievement was at first and for a time a dream.

column2: The oak sleeps in the acorn; the bird waits in the egg; and in the highest vision of the soul a waking angel stirs.

column2: Your circumstances may be uncongenial, but they shall not long remain so if you but perceive an Ideal and strive to reach it.

column2: But he dreams of better things; he thinks of intelligence, of refinement, of grace and beauty.

column2: It has become so out of harmony with his mentality that it falls out of his life as a garment is cast aside, and, with the growth of opportunities, which fit the scope of his expanding powers, he passes out of it forever.

column2: Years later we see this youth as a full-grown man.

column2: In his hands he holds the cords of gigantic responsibilities; he speaks, and lo, lives are changed; men and women hang upon his words and remould their characters, and, sunlike, he becomes the fixed and luminous centre round which innumerable destinies revolve.

column2: He has realized the Vision of his youth.

column2: He has become one with his Ideal.

column2: And you, too, youthful reader, will realize the Vision (not the idle wish) of your heart, be it base or beautiful, or a mixture of both, for you will always gravitate toward that which you, secretly, most love.

column2: Into your hands will be placed the exact results of your own thoughts; you will receive that which you earn; no more, no less. Whatever your present environment may be, you will fall, remain, or rise with your thoughts, your Vision, your Ideal.

And now you have become the master, who did so recently dream of great things while driving sheep.
